title: MM handing out a lot of griefers lately?
body:
Legitimately, this is not hard to diagnose and prevent. Just implement a stat-tracking script that autobans people who are toxic AND feed.

WW is toxic in chat, goes 0/22 then quits.
Lose game.

Second game, a *different* ww walks straight into enemy team, feeds, buys Sheen, quits at 0/9 score.
His buddy who went into the same lane as amumu and fed the second kill stuck around to feed 2/22

All 3 had ridiculously obvious bot-names or accounts they clearly intend to sell after reaching 30 and buying the rename option.

I'm currently at a 4-7 win/loss in SR blinds because i literally cannot carry *two* intentional feeders.
Maybe in previous seasons it was possible but not anymore. You can't win 3v5 anymore.

replies.body: I don't have any friends, i'm level 11

ask in forums then
